audios.au: With ECAS several solenoid valves or valve blocks are used, developed for different requirements.
This ECAS rear axle valve is able to pressurize or vent the left and the right supporting bellows of a rear axle, according to the control commands of the ECAS ECU.

When 2 height sensors have been installed, the superstructure can be kept parallel to the axle even when the load is one-sided. To do so, different pressures are used for the bellows on the left and right . This in also referred to as 2-point-control.
